summary: This document outlines the designation of Bella Klein as the successor trustee of The 2013 Butterfly Trust, effective upon the death, resignation, or removal of Richard Kahn. It includes signatures from both Richard Kahn and Bella Klein, as well as acknowledgment from Jeffrey E. Epstein as the grantor.
